text: @HillaryClinton Teachers should take an oath just like law officers.  The corona is bologna.  Democrats (like you) just want the covid-19 to be a pandemic until November 3rd.   So sad that you will destroy your country so you can keep your corrupt way of life (and keep yourself out of jail)
